name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Willie Maurice HARRIS, a/k/a Maurice Harris, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
Former Justices NIGRO and NEWMAN did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Willie Maurice HARRIS, a/k/a Maurice Harris, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of February, 2007, the appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Former Justices NIGRO and NEWMAN did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Thomas N. Farrell, Esq., Farrell & Kozlowski, Pittsburgh, for Willie Maurice Harris.
Michael Wayne Streily, Esq., Margaret Kathleen Barker, Esq., Allegheny County District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
915 A.2d 626
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Willie Maurice HARRIS, a/k/a Maurice Harris, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 14, 2005.
Decided Feb. 20, 2007.
Thomas N. Farrell, Esq., Farrell & Kozlowski, Pittsburgh, for Willie Maurice Harris.
Michael Wayne Streily, Esq., Margaret Kathleen Barker, Esq., Allegheny County District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
